lines.text: Can you help me please?
Can we help you? Yes ma'am.
Can you check my motor, it whistles.
I don't blame it!
Look Rusty, I thought maybe you and I could go dancing or something.
So you wanna go dancing?
Or something.
It should be obvious that I'm completely indifferent to anything this boy might give me .... its a tree!

[Singing]
My rival is a baby blue racing car.
That's quite a rig, I never saw anything like it.
Yeah its one of a kind, I built it myself.
Oh now I get it, you want me to use my 'bravado' to block for you so you can... come right through.
That's right, I knew you were clever Mr Jackson.
Well just a couple or 3 things wrong with your proposition. I don't work for anybody, I never come second to anybody and 1 small thing - I intend to win.
Can you lend me a car until you get mine running again?
We'll do better than that - I'll be happy to drive you wherever you want to go.
And why should you go to all that bother?
Cause around here I'm known as your very bothering mechanic.
I'm sure you are.
I heard about your money Lucky, I'm sorry.
It's only money.
Only money! Do you realise how hard it is to earn money.
But I won it.
You answer it and if its anybody, I don't want to speak to him!
What does he need a gun for?
To shoot you if you don't get outta the way!

[Speaking about Count Mancini's bonnet]
I'd like to see what you've got under there.
Its what I call a real sport model.
What difference does it make? Unfortunately you are on your way to Los Angeles and I have to work on my car, therefore we have no time for a beautiful girl.
I guess you're right.
You work on my car, I'll work on your girl.

[On seeing Elvis dressed as a waiter]
What's this, some kind of American joke?

[In helicopter]
Hey, this is fun!
Only way to travel.

Ah - that's the Hoover Dam, one of the seven modern civil engineering wonders of the century. Do you know its over 700 feet from the River Colorado to the top of the dam. The dam helps make enough electricity to light up homes 300 miles away.
Where you from Rusty?
Debuke.
Well whaddya know, I've never been there myself but its interesting that you're from good old Debuke.
Before you get too attached to 'good old Debuke' we moved there from Chillicothe, Ohio.
Chillicothe, Ohio, well how about that, I've never been there either.
Well that's a coincidence, that you were born in Las Veags and after all that travelling I met you in Las Vegas.
I guess you got big plans for your future don't you.
You'll probably find it very dull and commonplace but I want to earn enough money to help my father buy a boat.
You kids came over here in a copter! They cost about $10 a minute!
You get the motor?
You better believe I got the motor Lucky.
Hey I just don't understand this part of you, I really don't.
What do you mean this part of me - it is me!
When I get into the money you can have 100 trees.

[To tree]
You know Mr Tree, you and I might have a big celebration this xmas, we can both get lit up!
I'll trade you in this honeymoon for your pool table cause you don't need it.
I don't need a honeymoon!
Look if you came overe here to talk you're wasting everyone's time. If you came to work then put this on
[throws boilersuit over]
and get to work.
Gonna find her if it takes all night.

[Entering wild-looking Texan casino]
Welcome sons of the Lone Star State!

[Sees two girls going out still partying]
Looks like they're having fun.
Good morning, I've been looking for you all night.
You must be desperate to find a model that really needs fixing.
